name: Señor Brown Cocktail
description: In this simple drink, smoky mezcal offers a savory quality that unfolds on your tongue, and apple soda provides a bracing tartness.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 ounce mezcal (such as Del Maguey Mezcal Vida)
Apple soda, such as Sidral Mundet Sour

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a Collins glass with ice. Add mezcal and top with soda. Stir gently to combine. Serve.
